showcaseData.title: Research
showcaseData.description: My current research projects center around collaboration and data visualization in mixed reality.

cardData.title: Collaboration Patterns in Augmented Reality
cardData.content: We present a user study that explores collaboration styles in augmented reality along with a novel way of qualitatively encoding collaborative behaviors. This project is on-going in preparation for submission for publication.

cardData.title: Real-time AR Video Processing
cardData.content: I applied image processing and shading techniques to create a cell-style shader effect on the real-time video feed of an AR headset. My work contributes towards a larger project focused on using technical and theatrical techniques to erase the line between the physical and virtual worlds in mixed reality experiences.
